action.action-desc: Mr. Issa (for himself and Mr. Nadler) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to permit other courts to transfer certain cases to United States Tax Court.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Access to the Courts for Taxpayers Act.
Section 1631 of title 28, United States Code, is amended by inserting (or, for cases within the jurisdiction of the United States Tax Court, to that court) after any other such court.
